(\w Formerly|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* God \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w let|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w seer|strong="H7203"\w*.” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w formerly|strong="H6440"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w seer|strong="H7203"\w*.)

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w gateway|strong="H8179"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* asked, “Would \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w seer|strong="H7203"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w*?”
